DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare change z-scores growth 120-day study period child picky eating behavior randomly assign receive nutrition counseling ( control group ) nutrition counsel plus oral milk-based nutritional supplement ( study group ) . The secondary objective study compare follow control study group : ) dietary macro- micro-nutrient intake ; b ) quantitative ultrasound bone measurement radius tibia ; c ) incidence common illness ( diarrhea , upper low respiratory tract ) . The safety objective study compare frequency adverse event ( AE ) among control group study group subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect New Growing-up Milk Growth Nutrient Adequacy Children With Picky-eating Behaviors
DOC.criteria: Children age 3060 month PE behavior report caregiver whose weightforheight ≤25th percentile accord World Health Organization ( WHO ) Child Growth Standards eligible inclusion . Current acute chronic illness , food allergy , lactose intolerance , dietary restriction preclude dairy food , genetic disorder may compromise growth and/or food intake , cognitive developmental disorder , medication may influence study outcome .
